meanings.sent1: The topmost shelf held all the books.
meanings.sent2: The topmost floor of the building offered a stunning view.
meanings.sent3: The topmost cookie jar was out of reach for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her topmost priority was to finish her homework before bedtime.
meanings.sent5: The topmost star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.definition: Situated at the highest point; highest.
meanings.sent1: The topmost branch of the tree swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The topmost mountain peak was covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The topmost bunk in the bed was the favorite spot for the child.
meanings.sent4: His topmost achievement was winning the race.
meanings.sent5: The topmost layer of the cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
